    Created by Shynixn 2018.

        Is location inside of this selection.

      • getRelativeBlockDirectionToLocation

        BlockDirection getRelativeBlockDirectionToLocation(Position location)

        If the given location is outside the arena it returns the block direction in which the arena can be reached.
